text: wadhkuruu niematana ealaykum -w'antum eitash fi alttih- hin daeana musaa -bdraeat- 'ana nasqi qawmiha, faqulna: adrib bieasak alhajra, fadriba, fanfajarat minh athnata eashrat eynana, bieadad alqabayili, mae 'iielam kl qubilat bialeayn alkhasat biha hataa la yatanazaeuu. waqulna lahuma: kuluu washrabuu min rizq allaha, wala tasieuu fi al'ard mufasidina
